text: Ezɨ Apner gɨn kamaghɨn Devit mɨgei, “Nɨ na ateghtɨ, kɨ mangɨva Israelia bar me inigh izɨtɨ, me nɨn apengan ikɨsɨ nɨ ko akar gavgavim akɨram. Eghtɨ nɨ ifongezɨ moghɨn, nɨ kantrin kamɨn danganiba bar dar atrivimɨn ikiam.” Ezɨ Devit uan adaraziv gɨa ghaze, ia arazir kuratamɨn Apner damuan markɨ. Egha a Apner amadazɨma, a navir amɨrizim sara uamategha ghu.
